Demo page to show how to work with the server.

This page uses bootstrap

To add bootstrap functionality to your page, include this in your html's head section:

<script language="javascript" src="/bootstrap/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css" />

These are great references:

  • Bootstrap.com
  • Ray's bootstrap site

It is also possible to display your own content on the page.

To display your image, you need to place the image file inside the server's designated folder: /dist/img

Then, to request the content inside the img folder, you need to specify the src value like this: src="/img/<folder>/<filename.extension>"

Additional types to include:

  • javascript
  • server folder: /dist/js
  • src template: src="/js/<folder>/<filename.extension>"
  • css
  • server folder: /dist/css
  • href template: href="/css/<folder>/<filename.extension>"
Please let me know if you need additional file types in your pages!
